53.

54.
175Upādinnupādāniyo hetu dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Upādinnupādāniyo hetu dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
